Used in: *[[Netgear DGND3700v1]] Board ID = U12L144T01 *[[Netgear DGND3800B]] Board ID = U12L144T11 This routers uses an internal detachable miniPCI wifi card. *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/dgnd3700#wifi ''Netgear DGND3700/DGND3800B'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :It's dual band, with two BCM43222 radios. The first radio operates at 2.4GHz band, :the second operates at 5GHz band but also capable of working in 2GHz band.
